result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:36 PM Defendant Joray Marlin Ledin not in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman not in court.  Attorney Lynne Van Hollen appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Def was ordered to appear in person.  Warrant issued, BOW, statewide.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Def was ordered to appear in person, did call the Clerks office that he was sick. Ct will adj the hearing. 
DEFENDANT MUST APPEAR IN PERSON !!

Adjourned initial appearance on August 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:14 PM Prosecuting attorney Ruth Diane Kressel appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joray Marlin Ledin in court. Adjourned initial appearance on July 25, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Def shall not possess or consume any mind-altering substances meaning alcoholic beverages, controlled substances, inhalants, synthetic marijuana, or similar substances and/or over the counter medications used contrary to label instructions, or prescription medications not taken in compliance with a prescription issued to the defendant.  Def is not to go into any place where mind altering substances are present, maintained, sold or consumed, except defendant may enter a convenience   store or grocery store, even if alcohol is sold there.
  Def to have NO Abusive Contact w/S.T.

10:12 AM Defendant Joray Marlin Ledin in court with attorney Michelle M Erdman.  David V. Meany appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def apprs in person and atty by ZOOM-- Def was schd on May 23, failed to appr, def could post $250, whioch he posted. Ct orders -- $250 cash bail, posted with all prev conditions. Back on the record, 10:27am-- The def came back after the parties had a break out, but the atty is not in the hearing.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Regarding Posting Bond

10:42 AM Attorney Ruth Diane Kressel appeared by video means for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Joray Marlin Ledin not in court.  Atty and def do not appear. State is asking for bond forf. 
  Ct orders Body only warrant. can post $250 in lieu of arrest.  Ct orders the bond forfeited, COC will send notice and if no response in 30 days judgment will enter.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
